response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. I am proposing to sell this product to you for $11,000. This special price is my way of rewarding early adopters and ensuring that you receive the best value for your investment. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this opportunity.", "product_price": 11000}
